projects.name: Huddle
projects.alt: Logo of two figures with the label Huddle
projects.description: Huddle seeks to improve interaction (social, academic, and professional) among students in the U-M School of Information (UMSI) and provide a comprehensive archive of resource for students to access.

projects.name: Civic User Testing: Improving Poll Work
projects.alt: image of a red and blue button that reads 'Vote'
projects.description: We partnered with the Michigan Bureau of Elections (BOE) to improve the Election Inspector's Procedure Manual, a paper document that the BOE supplies to each polling location on Election Day

projects.name: Service Design Evaluation
projects.alt: Blue logo of University of Michigan Dearborn
projects.description: Myself and team of three other U-M students to evaluate our client's service design and give feedback on their marketing approach.

projects.name: Tiger Traffic
projects.description: Building a mobile app that would allow people to check how busy areas of DePauw's campus such as the dining hall or the library were from the comfort of their dorms.
